about_the_game:
Wiktor - Young, insecure, and the reserved boy wakes up in the foggy, seemingly abandoned place, where things are not always what they seem...
Guide him during his puzzle-platformer, side-scrolling adventure, discover forgotten Slavic legends, and find things that nazis left buried after World War II.



Through platforming elements, challenging puzzles and characters met, slowly uncover the boy's purpose in the world he found himself in.
Discover beautiful and magical polish landscape touched by the Third Reich during Second World War. Help Wiktor survive encounters with creatures that inhabit the forest.
Dive deep into a dark world filled with magical creatures and secrets for you to discover.

Main Features:


  • Get lost in the beautiful and magical polish landscape touched by the Third Reich during Second World War.
  • Solve engaging puzzles.
  • Test yourself in challenging platforming elements.
  • Survive encounters with creatures that inhabit the forest.
  • Manipulate the light to unravel secrets and keep yourself sane
  • Meet characters with unclear motives.
  • Discover the boy’s purpose in the world he found himself in.



8874 uses a photometric system to reflect real objects and locations from Walbrzych, an old mining town, and the surrounding areas of Dolny Slask in Poland.

About the Game





Wiktor - Young, insecure, and the reserved boy wakes up in the foggy, seemingly abandoned place, where things are not always what they seem...
Guide him during his puzzle-platformer, side-scrolling adventure, discover forgotten Slavic legends, and find things that nazis left buried after World War II.



Through platforming elements, challenging puzzles and characters met, slowly uncover the boy's purpose in the world he found himself in.
Discover beautiful and magical polish landscape touched by the Third Reich during Second World War. Help Wiktor survive encounters with creatures that inhabit the forest.
Dive deep into a dark world filled with magical creatures and secrets for you to discover.

Main Features:


  • Get lost in the beautiful and magical polish landscape touched by the Third Reich during Second World War.
  • Solve engaging puzzles.
  • Test yourself in challenging platforming elements.
  • Survive encounters with creatures that inhabit the forest.
  • Manipulate the light to unravel secrets and keep yourself sane
  • Meet characters with unclear motives.
  • Discover the boy’s purpose in the world he found himself in.



8874 uses a photometric system to reflect real objects and locations from Walbrzych, an old mining town, and the surrounding areas of Dolny Slask in Poland.
legal_notice: Art Games Studio S.A. All rights reserved.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 3GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Core i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon™ RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Climatic side scroller where history plot intermingles with Slavic legends, Second World War, and paranormal activity. Solve complex puzzles, do some platforming, interact with various characters, discover their unclear motives, and be a part of the dark and forgotten mystery.
supported_languages:
English*, Polish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
